description-Services.title: Quick Delivery and Comprehensive Support
description-Services.description: Most products are in stock and ready for same-day shipping - contact us to get your order started

slider1.name: Optical 3D Profilometer
slider1.feature1: Measuring and displaying the three-dimensional profile of the surface
slider1.feature3: Ability to measure flat and spherical, liquid and solid surfaces.
slider1.feature4: Non-destructive and no need for sample preparation

slider3.name: Furnace monitoring camera
slider3.feature1: The ability to change the angle and field of view according to the order
slider3.feature2: Optical design based on high temperature resistancer
slider3.feature3: Air-cooled cooling system only (no need for cooling water)
slider3.feature4: No need for a self-retracting system
